        public void onNewTurn()
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Callback called when a new turn starts. (ie. all players have jumped once since the last one)
        Specified by:
        onNewTurn in interface Game
        Overrides:
        onNewTurn in class AbstractGame

      • isPlayerTurn

        public boolean isPlayerTurn(Player player)
        Description copied from interface: Game
        Check if it's the given player turn. This is used by GameListener to check if events need to be processed. So this method should be optimized as much as possible because some events (like PlayerMoveEvent) are heavy.
        Parameters:
        player - The player.
        Returns:
        true if it's player turn, false otherwise.
